resources.string: Tick the symptoms you are experiencing
TO TALK TO YOUR LOCAL GOVERNMENT HELPLINE TAP THE BUTTON BELOW.
TO SEE THE NEAREST AVAILABLE FACILITY FOR COVID-19 TREATMENT TAP THE BUTTON BELOW.

AS OF NOW YOUR SYMPTOMS ARE NOT SO SEVERE THERE IS A POSSIBILITY THAT YOU ARE NOT SUFFERING FROM COVID-19 SO WE WILL SUGGEST YOU TO CONSULT TO A NEAREST AVAILABLE DOCTOR WHICH IS SHOWN BELOW ACCORDING TO YOUR LOCATION AT PRESENT.
after collaboration from various apps like practo,lybrate,GrowAyu the user will be able to see doctors availability and also book an appointment according to his location

HERE DEPENDING ON THE USER LATITUDE AND LONGITUDE THE INFORMATION ABOUT THE NEAREST AVAILABLE FACILITY BE IT ANY HOSPITAL,TESTING FACILITY OR ANY QUARANTINE FACILITY WILL BE LISTED ACCORDING TO THE DATA PROVIDED BY VARIOUS NGOs AND GOVERNMENT AGENCIES
